title: conferred on her by section 43(2) of the Adoption (Amendment) Act 2017 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Adoption (Amendment) Act 2017
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Adoption (Amendment) Act 2017 

(Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited adoption (amendment) act 2017 (commencement) order 2020

title: conferred on her by section 43(2) of the Adoption (Amendment) Act 2017 (No.
heading: 2. The 4th day of May 2020 is appointed as the day on which the Adoption
text_raw:
2. The 4th day of May 2020 is appointed as the day on which the Adoption 
(Amendment) Act 2017 (No. 19 of 2017), insofar as it is not already in 
operation, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Minister for Children 

and Youth Affairs, 
16 March, 2020. 

KATHERINE ZAPPONE, 

Minister for Children and Youth Affairs. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th March, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 EXPLANATORY NOTE 

[80] 3 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order appoints 4 May 2020 as the date on which the following provisions 
of the Adoption (Amendment) Act 2017 come into operation: 

Section 3(a) of the 2017 Act in so far as it amends section 3(1) of the 
Adoption Act 2010 to insert the following definitions: 

“donor-conceived child”; 

“father”; and 

paragraph (b) of “relevant non-guardian”. 

Section 3(b) of the 2017 Act in so far as it amends section 3(1) of the 2010 
Act to insert a new paragraph (b) into definition of “parent”. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [80]
